_sText:
This map was ported by ksf. The original creator is Serz.  I decided to upload it for people who want to play the map in source or momentum-mod and also because I couldn't find it online.  Here is the description of the csgo version (you don't need to install any plugins or scripts those instructions are for csgo):
hey so this is a surf map with 6 stages, it has fluid gameplay throug out the map (mostly) wich means if you fail you'll start back up at the last checkpoint with enough speed to finish that stage. 

also if you want to play the map as it is intended (please do) then install the SM plugin I included in the .rar, it's a particle precacher, 2 files big the smx and sp, merge the sourcemod folders and you should be good to go.

Big thanks to tony for geting me this after i tirelessly tried working stuff out with what i had from before. 

zone trigger_multiple's and teleport destinations for those of you with those kinds of server plugins;

stage1 - teleport1

stage2 - surfpart2.2blackbox

stage3 - surfpart2.3blackbox

stage4 - wtf

stage5 - wtf2

stage6 - surfpart2.zblackbox

endzone

bonus_start - poolbonus

bonus_end

now there is a few minor problems, with this precaching plugin there is one particle i couldent get to play as it should but whatever and some other minor shit but im done working on this so yep

i feel like im forgetting something else very important but ill come back and edit if there is anything.
